member.name: T:Kermalis.PokemonBattleEngine.DefaultData.AI.PBEDDAI
member.summary: Creates valid decisions for a team in a battle. Decisions may not be valid for custom settings and/or move changes.

member.name: M:Kermalis.PokemonBattleEngine.DefaultData.AI.PBEDDAI.CreateActions
member.summary: Creates valid actions for a battle turn for a specific team.
member.exception: Thrown when has no active battlers or 's 's is not .
Thrown when a Pokémon has no moves, the AI tries to use a move with invalid targets, or 's 's is invalid.

member.name: M:Kermalis.PokemonBattleEngine.DefaultData.AI.PBEDDAI.CreateSwitches
member.summary: Creates valid switches for a battle for a specific team.
member.exception: Thrown when does not require switch-ins or 's 's is not .

member.name: F:Kermalis.PokemonBattleEngine.DefaultData.PBEDDMoveObtainMethod.Form
member.summary: The move is learned by a Pokémon when changing forms. The move cannot be used by other forms if this is the only flag or if the species cannot change forms.
